headline: APi (APG) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: APi (APG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 6.25% and 1.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
